segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout, with cabinets and counters all around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's splashing everywhere, making a mess on the doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is disgusting, spreading like a stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, unaware, which is frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stool is pilfering cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is right there in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balancing act looks precarious and unnecessary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is aiding him, reaching up greedily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat, unlike this sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these dishes stacked up, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just poorly managed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they clean up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
